definition: hyperbaric oxygen/hyperbaric oxygenation/also abbr. for 高壓氧治療|高压氧治疗[gao1 ya1 yang3 zhi4 liao2], hyperbaric therapy
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
hyperbaric medicine/hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧療法|高压氧疗法[gao1 ya1 yang3 liao2 fa3]
hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧治療|高压氧治疗[gao1 ya1 yang3 zhi4 liao2]

sentences.english: Hyperbaric oxygen exposure is probably the most accepted model of oxidative lung injury.
sentences.chinese: 高壓氧倉被公認爲氧化肺損傷的重要模式。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect and mechanism of hyperbaric oxygenation(HBO) therapy for perennial allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高壓氧治療常年性變應性鼻炎的療效及機理。

sentences.english: High oxygenic pressure vessels worked as the environmental control and ecological protection has no exception.
sentences.chinese: 作爲環控生保系統的高壓氧容器也不例外。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of hyperbaric oxygen on patients with diabetic foot.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高壓氧綜合治療糖尿病足的療效。

sentences.english: Treatment group on the basis of combined therapy using high-pressure oxygen(hyperbaric oxygen, HBO)treatment.
sentences.chinese: 治療組在綜合治療的基礎上採用高壓氧治療。

sentences.english: Objective To promote the effect of hyperbaric oxygen therapy for posterior cerebral artery infarction due to brain hernia.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高腦疝性大腦後動脈梗死的高壓氧治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of hyperbaric oxygen in the treatment of post-stroke depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察高壓氧治療卒中後抑鬱症的療效。

sentences.english: Among them cure of high-pressured oxygen cabin is optimal.
sentences.chinese: 其中高壓氧艙治療最佳。

sentences.english: There's the hyperbaric chamber; a concentrated dose of oxygen might help.
sentences.chinese: 高壓氧艙也是一種選擇，高劑量的氧氣可以起些效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of hyperbaric therapy in treating phlebitis caused by venous indwelling needle.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高壓氧治療靜脈留置針所致靜脈炎的療效。

sentences.english: Doctors do not know if you open a number of hyperbaric oxygen treatment.
sentences.chinese: 不知道醫生給你開的高壓氧有幾個療程。

sentences.english: Objective to explore clinical effect of Hyperbaric oxygenation on ocular fundus diseases and ocular traumas .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高壓氧治療眼底病及眼外傷的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Can the patient after thyroid cancer art do high-pressured oxygen to treat?
sentences.chinese: 甲狀腺癌術後患者可以做高壓氧治療嗎？
